entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or drizzle. Fog patches dissipating late this afternoon. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northeast 20 gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming north 30 gusting to 50 late this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Wednesday 15 March 2023
